group_1.textCenter: Oh? I think someone dropped this.
(I still have time before work, so I'll go@drop it off.)

group_1.textRight: Ah... My sincerest and deepest apologies!

group_1.textLeft: It's okay. I'm just happy we're on the same@page now.

group_1.textRight: No... That's not enough!
You were kind enough to return a lost item@to our dojo.
And I called you a thief and challenged@you...
I must atone for my behavior.
Therefore, I must...

group_1.textLeft: Must?

group_1.textRight: I must kill myself!

group_1.textLeft: ...[wait:0.8][chara:303201:motion_0][chara:303201:lipSynch_1]What?
Um... Is that something people from your@dojo say?

group_1.textRight: No, it is not something I say lightly!

group_1.textLeft: [chara:303201:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Huh? What?!
No wait! P-please don't!
Okay, so you're looking for your stolen book@of secrets.

group_1.textRight: Yes, it has been handed down for generations.@It's invaluable to us.
When I returned home, I saw a stranger@leaving the dojo.

group_1.textLeft: And that stranger was me. That's why you@mistook me for the thief.

group_1.textRight: Yes... Please forgive me!

group_1.textLeft: No, it's fine. Please don't worry about it.

group_1.textRight: So that other person must've been the true@culprit.

group_1.textLeft: Other person?

group_1.textRight: There was actually another girl wandering@around the dojo looking very troubled.
She was very suspicious!

group_1.textLeft: Oh! That IS suspicious.

group_1.textRight: You think so too?!
It was a blond girl with pigtails, wearing@a Mizuna Girls' Academy uniform.
She was mumbling something about stealing.@It was about as suspicious as it gets!

group_1.textLeft: Wait...

group_1.narration: A blond girl with pigtails wearing@a Mizuna Girls' Academy uniform.

group_1.textLeft: Um, that girl...
Did she happen to have a beautiful face@like a doll?

group_1.textRight: Yes! She did! She was very pretty.
Do you know who she is?!

group_1.textLeft: I'm pretty sure I do. But she would never...
Oh! A photo! I have a photo of her on my@phone.
Was it really this girl?

group_1.textRight: Let me take a look.
Yes! There's no mistake! It's the girl in@this photo!

group_1.narration: But what was she doing by a dojo that had@just been robbed?

group_1.textRight: So she's an acquaintance of yours?

group_1.textLeft: Yes, but Ria would never steal anything.
She's definitely not that kind of person!

group_1.textRight: But there's no denying she was seen near @the dojo.
Where is this person right now?

group_1.textLeft: I'm not sure. I can't get in touch with her.@I'm actually looking for her too.

group_1.textRight: You are?

group_1.textLeft: Yes, there was a theft at the museum I@work at.

group_1.textRight: And she's responsible for that as well?!

group_1.textLeft: No! Ria isn't a thief!
She just happened to be caught on the@security camera right after the crime.

group_1.textRight: Well, um... Isn't that suspicious?

group_1.textLeft: Er, not necessarily!
Right before she came, the postcard suddenly@disappeared like magic.
I thought maybe a Witch stole it, and Ria@was chasing it.
I was worried something happened, so@I started looking for her.

group_1.textRight: I see...
Then there is only one thing left to do!
Let's find this Ria and see what she has to@say for herself!

group_1.textLeft: [chara:303201:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:303201:cheek_0][chara:303201:face_mtn_ex_050.exp.json][chara:303201:lipSynch_1]Okay. Oh, but...
Please don't attack her suddenly...

group_1.textRight: Ah, of course... I'll be sure to listen to@what she has to say first!
